holidays.title: Clean Out Your Bookcase Day
holidays.description: Your old dusty books need some T.L.C. every once in a while. Let’s dive in.

holidays.title: Hoodie Hoo Day
holidays.description: Goodbye winter, welcome spring; this is what Hoodie Hoo Day is all about.

holidays.title: Mizoram State Day
holidays.description: Learn about the history of Mizoram and why this day is so special.

holidays.title: National Caregivers Day
holidays.description: We honor individuals who selflessly provide physical-and emotional support to those who need it most.

holidays.title: National Cherry Pie Day
holidays.description: With all its fruity, buttery goodness, we have our forks ready to devour this delicious dessert.

holidays.title: National Comfy Day
holidays.description: On this day, push yourself to be totally comfortable no matter the circumstances. Let’s get comfy!

holidays.title: National Day of Solidarity with Muslim Arab and South Asian Immigrants
holidays.description: Come out en masse and speak up for your acquaintances, friends, and even strangers of minorities.

holidays.title: National Handcuff Day
holidays.description: Do you know how handcuffs were created? Read on to find out more about the innovation.

holidays.title: National Leadership Day
holidays.description: A good leader not only leads but also inspires others to do their best.

holidays.title: National Muffin Day
holidays.description: Can you think of something more universally loved than muffins?

holidays.title: National Student Volunteer Day
holidays.description: Let's come together to give back and build our community this National Student Volunteer Day.

holidays.title: National Tartar Sauce Day
holidays.description: As long as you have your tartar sauce next to it, you can never go wrong with seafood.

holidays.title: National Whistleblower Reward Day
holidays.description: Want to save the economy and government and make your lives better? Read this.

holidays.title: No One Eats Alone Day
holidays.description: Sit with the loneliest kid and share your meal with him or her as you bond.

holidays.title: No Politics Day
holidays.description: Leave the politics out of it and read on for fun suggestions!

holidays.title: Statehood Day of Arunachal Pradesh
holidays.description: The historic and geographically beautiful state in northeast India is celebrating another year of statehood today.

holidays.title: Women in Blue Jeans Days
holidays.description: Put on your denim tops and snazzy jeans! Let's celebrate Women in Blue Jeans Day!

holidays.title: World Day of Social Justice
holidays.description: Bring out your inner activist and promote the growing importance of social justice.

holidays.title: Rihanna’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rihanna entertains us with her awesome pop numbers and inspires us with the way she lives life on her own terms. And that’s reflected in…

holidays.title: Charles Barkley’s Birthday
holidays.description: Barkley had a basketball career that few could match and he’ll always sit among the legends.

holidays.title: Cindy Crawford’s Birthday
holidays.description: This supermodel has achieved enviable fame and success, and her legacy is timeless.

holidays.title: Elmo O'Dwyer’s Birthday
holidays.description: A huge TikTok star with major potential in entertainment, the star is his springboard.

holidays.title: Kurt Cobain’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cobain is considered to be one of the most influential musicians in the history of rock.

holidays.title: Olivia Rodrigo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Oliver Rodrigo is a triple threat, alented in singing, songwriting, and acting.

holidays.title: Trevor Noah’s Birthday
holidays.description: Trevor Noah has won several awards over the years, including Personality of the Year award.
